value: Chaos Orb(s) - remove all mods on a magical item and replace them with 1d4 mods
Orb(s) of Destruction - Remove a random mod from a magic item or relic
Annulment Orb(s) - Remove a mod of your choice from a magic item or artifact
Orb(s) of Creation - Convert a mundane item into a magical item with disadvantaged 1d4 mods
Orb(s) of Flux - swap magical properties between compatible items, including simply moving enchantments to mundane items
Exalted Orb - add a mod to a magical item, to a maximum of 5
Orb of Rare Candy - level up a relic, must use within 24 hours
Orb of Empowerment - double a mod on a magic item or artifact (can't be a special relic mod). An item cannot have more than one doubled mod
Orb of Mulligan - completely level down a relic, then level it back up to its current level. Before levelling it back up, you can let go of your attunement to it.
Orb of Purification - Apply to an amulet and roll 1d6. If you roll above its current CR capacity, you may increase its capacity by 1. Contained creature does not change.
